ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) bone-in fully cooked ham steak

cookingTips: Score the ham's surface lightly in a crosshatch pattern to help the glaze adhere
Cook on medium-high heat just until the glaze caramelizes, about 5-7 minutes per side
Let the ham rest for 2 minutes after cooking to retain moisture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on quick-cooking glazed meats and proper scoring techniques for better flavor absorption.
